document_data.name: Might of Mystra
document_data.mainbody: '''''Might of Mystra''''' was a multi-[[school of magic|school]] [[divine]] spell that allowed a [[cleric]] to replicate the effects of another spell.
document_data.Effects: Once cast, the magic of ''might of Mystra'' remained in effect for a single day. If the caster saw another spell being cast during this day, they could choose to replicate its effects immediately afterwards.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell could be displayed by the [[relic]] known as the ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
